trans-unit.source: Provides a container for metadata for a model.
trans-unit.target: 提供模型中繼資料的容器。

trans-unit.source: The word *model* is used differently in the context of this class than it is typically used elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Word*模型*的使用方式在這個類別的內容中與它通常在其他地方使用。

trans-unit.source: In an ASP.NET Web Forms application, the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingContext.ModelType%2A> attribute of a data-bound control specifies the type of a data element that the data control is bound to.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web Form 應用程式中，<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingContext.ModelType%2A>資料繫結控制項的屬性指定繫結至資料控制項的資料元素的類型。

trans-unit.source: This type is typically referred to as the model, and it typically corresponds to a row in a database table.
trans-unit.target: 此類型通常稱為模型，而它通常會對應到資料庫資料表中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the model typically correspond to columns of the table.
trans-unit.target: 模型的屬性通常會對應到資料表資料行。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata> object can provide metadata for the model itself or for a property of the model, or for a property of a complex property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata>物件可以將模型本身或屬性的模型，或複雜屬性的屬性提供中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata> object pertains to a property, the word *model* refers to the property, and the word *container* refers to the model.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata>物件都屬於屬性，這個字*模型*屬性，而且這個字是指*容器*指的是模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the model might be **Contact**, which has **Name** and **Age** properties, and the **Name** property might be a complex property composed of **FirstName** and **LastName**.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此模型可能是**連絡人**，具有**名稱**和**年齡**屬性，而**名稱**屬性可能是複雜屬性組成**FirstName**和**LastName**。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata> object pertains to the **Contact** object, the model type is **Contact** and there is no container.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata>物件都屬於**連絡人**物件，模型型別為**連絡人**，而且沒有任何容器。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata> object pertains to the **Name** property, the model type is **Name** and the container type is **Contact**.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata>物件都屬於**名稱**屬性的模型型別是**名稱**容器類型是**連絡人**。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata> object pertains to the **FirstName** property, the model type is **FirstName** and the container type is **Name**.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata>物件都屬於**FirstName**屬性的模型型別是**FirstName**容器類型是**名稱**。

trans-unit.source: The provider object.
trans-unit.target: 提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the container, or <see langword="null" /> to create metadata for the model type.
trans-unit.target: 容器的型別，或者為 <see langword="null" />（為模型型別建立中繼資料）。

trans-unit.source: The model accessor.
trans-unit.target: 模型存取子。

trans-unit.source: The type of the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型的型別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property, or <see langword="null" /> to create metadata for the model type.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱，或<see langword="null" />（為模型型別建立中繼資料）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains additional metadata about the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含關於模型之其他中繼資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains additional metadata about the model.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中包含關於模型的其他中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the container.
trans-unit.target: 取得容器的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the container, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no container.
trans-unit.target: 容器的型別，如果沒有任何容器，則為<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether empty strings that are submitted in forms should be converted to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷是否應該將表單中提交的空字串轉換成 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if empty strings should be converted to <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果空字串應該轉換成 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="null" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data type.
trans-unit.target: 資料型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide additional information about the type of data that is stored by the model.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來提供其他資訊的模型所儲存的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.ModelType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String>, this property might be "EmailAddress" or "Url" — that is, a name that indicates more than just that the data is typed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.ModelType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.String>，這個屬性可能是"EmailAddress"或"Url"— 亦即，不只是表示資料會輸入為字串的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that is always set to <c>10000</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一律設為 <c>10000</c> 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets text that describes the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述模型的文字。

trans-unit.source: The description text.
trans-unit.target: 描述文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a format string that should be applied when the model is displayed in display mode (as opposed to in edit mode).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當模型以顯示模式 (而不是編輯模式) 顯示時要套用的格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The format string.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to use in UI when the name of the model is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示模型名稱時要在 UI 中使用的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to use as the name of the model.
trans-unit.target: 要用來做為模型名稱的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format string to use in UI in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要以編輯模式使用在 UI 中的格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The format string.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns text to display as the name of the model in UI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回要在 UI 中顯示為模型名稱的文字。

trans-unit.source: Text to display as the name of the model in UI.
trans-unit.target: 要在 UI 中顯示為模型名稱的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName" /> property if that value is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不是 <see langword="null" />，預設為 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName" /> property is <see langword="null" />, the default value is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.PropertyName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />，則預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.PropertyName" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.PropertyName" /> property is <see langword="null" />, the default value comes from the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.ModelType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.PropertyName" /> 屬性是 <see langword="null" />，預設值是來自 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.ModelType" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns text to display for the model when the model represents a complex object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回當模型代表複雜物件時所顯示的模型文字。

trans-unit.source: The property value is derived by examining the following sequence of related values until a return value is found.
trans-unit.target: 藉由檢查下列相關值序列，直到找到傳回值時就會衍生屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.SimpleDisplayText" /> property value is not <see langword="null" />, that value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.SimpleDisplayText" /> 屬性值不是 <see langword="null" />，則會傳回該值。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.NullDisplayText" /> property value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性是 <see langword="null" />，則會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.NullDisplayText" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt to convert the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property to a string returns <see langword="null" />, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性轉換為字串傳回 <see langword="null" />，則會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: If the string conversion of the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property value is the same as the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property type, that value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性值的字串轉換等於 <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性型別的 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性，則傳回該值。

trans-unit.source: If there are no properties in the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Properties" /> collection, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Properties" /> 集合中沒有屬性，則會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: If none of the preceding tests have returned a value, the return value comes from the first property in the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Properties" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何先前測試都未傳回值，傳回值是來自 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Properties" /> 集合中的第一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property of the first property is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.NullDisplayText" /> property value is returned; otherwise the result of converting the first property's <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> property to a string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性是 <see langword="null" />，則會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.NullDisplayText" /> 屬性值，否則會傳回第一個屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.Model" /> 屬性轉換為字串的結果。

trans-unit.source: The model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 模型繫結執行內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of validators that apply to the model.
trans-unit.target: 傳回套用至模型的驗證程式集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of validators.
trans-unit.target: 驗證程式的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether surrounding HTML should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷是否應該隱藏周圍 HTML。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if surrounding HTML should be hidden; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該隱藏周圍 HTML，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the model is a complex type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指定模型是否為複雜型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the model is a complex type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型為複雜型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Built-in .NET Framework types are not considered complex types for purposes of this property.
trans-unit.target: 內建的.NET Framework 型別不會考量供此屬性的複雜類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the model is a nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定模型是否可為 null 的實值型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the model is a nullable value type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型是可為 null 的實值型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the model can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定模型是否可以更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the model is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型是唯讀的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。預設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the property is required.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否需要屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要這個屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for non-nullable value types and <see langword="false" /> for all other types.
trans-unit.target: 不可為 null 的實值型別，預設為 <see langword="true" />，其他所有型別，則預設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the model object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定模型物件。

trans-unit.source: The model object.
trans-unit.target: 模型物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得模型的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that should be displayed when the model is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得當模型為 <see langword="null" /> 時應該顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to display when the model is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 模型為 <see langword="null" /> 時要顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an integer that indicates the order in which to display this property relative to other properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整數，指出顯示這個屬性的順序 (相對於其他屬性)。

trans-unit.source: The relative order in which to display this property.
trans-unit.target: 用於顯示這個屬性的相對順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of model metadata objects that describe the properties of the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得模型中繼資料物件的集合，這類物件描述模型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Metadata for all properties in the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型中所有屬性的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property if the model is a property; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果該模型是一個屬性，則為屬性的名稱；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider object for this metadata.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個中繼資料的提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: The provider object for this metadata.
trans-unit.target: 這個中繼資料的提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether request validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否啟用要求驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if request validation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用要求驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a short version of the display name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定簡短的顯示名稱版本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display when a short version of the model name is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要精簡的模型名稱時會顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The short display name can be used in a tooltip or in any UI where the complete display name might not fit.
trans-unit.target: 完整顯示名稱可能不符合任何 UI 或工具提示中，可以使用簡短顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this field is `null`, the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName%2A> property should be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此欄位為`null`、<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.DisplayName%2A>應該使用屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the model should be displayed in the UI in display mode (as opposed to edit mode).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定模型是否應該以顯示模式 (而不是編輯模式) 顯示在 UI 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the model should be displayed in display mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該以顯示模式來顯示模型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the property should be displayed in edit mode (as opposed to display mode).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定屬性是否應該以編輯模式 (而不是顯示模式) 顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property should be displayed in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該以編輯模式來顯示屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets text to display for the model when the model represents a complex object
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當模型代表複雜物件時，要為該模型顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Text to display in UI for a complex object.
trans-unit.target: 要在複雜物件 UI 中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is determined by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.GetSimpleDisplayText" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.GetSimpleDisplayText" /> 方法來決定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what template (data control) should be used in UI for the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示模型的 UI 中應該使用何種範本 (資料控制項)。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates what template (data control) should be used in UI for the model.
trans-unit.target: 表示模型的 UI 中應該使用何種範本 (資料控制項) 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets watermark text for a text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字方塊的浮水印文字。

trans-unit.source: The watermark text.
trans-unit.target: 浮水印文字。

trans-unit.source: This property contains text to display as a watermark when a property is rendered for editing in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含要呈現在文字方塊中編輯屬性時，顯示做為浮水印的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 `null`。
